properties.name: 24 hr. mcdonalds
properties.description: Posted by Lizzomaticmlk and columbia blvd. mcdonalds sucks, but its open 24 hours and you can get moderately yummy strawberry milkshakes.

properties.name: Fabric World
properties.description: Posted by Lizzomatic 5300 N Lombard St, Portlanddo you believe in time machines? this store has literally pulled right out of the 70\'s and plopped itself down on N lombard 2006. They have a good selection of occasionally sun bleached 70\'s clothes and a wide array of amazing fabrics and notions. the staff, well, talk to them and they will talk to you...about everything, and particularly the amazing crafts they\'re making (baby blue mercedes upholstry leather pants, quilts w/ 256 shades of green). they will find you the perfect gold fringe or the perfect green button, give fab shoelace advice and take an hour to chattily ring up 25$ of merchandise....that is unless the grumpy owner is working.

properties.name: vaughan brother's industrial fabrics
properties.description: Posted by Lizzomatic a.k.a. the harley chihuahua fabric store. this is my favorite fabric store in portland... and not just because they give me free stuff. they\'re super nice, the location is hella convenient and they dress their tiny dogs up in harley outfits and have professional pictures taken on chihuahua-sized motorcycles. They only carry industrial fabrics, so don\'t go there looking for no sissy fabric...this ain\'t no barbie dreamland fabric store...this is the fucking harley ridin\' chihuahua fabric store!!!
